item.title: Hugo (Go)
item.description: Hugo (Go) Links gohugo.io GitHub A static-site generator written in Golang. Resources byteski/hugo-blog-sample Installing 1 brew install hugo 1 hugo version 1 Hugo Static Site Generator v0.80.0/extended darwin/amd64 BuildDate: unknown Creating a new site 1 hugo new site <folder-name> Structure 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 ls -1 archetypes/ config.
